lglass.database.schema¶

lglass.database.schema.InverseDatabase¶

alias of SchemaDatabase

class lglass.database.schema.SchemaDatabase(db, **kwargs)¶

The inverse databases resolves inverse relationships on find() and also validates the schema of objects.
